original_text: And the Lord restored the fortunes of Job, when he had prayed for his friends. And the Lord gave Job twice as much as he had before.
korean_text: 욥이 그의 친구들을 위하여 기도할 때 여호와께서 욥의 곤경을 돌이키시고 여호와께서 욥에게 이전 모든 소유보다 갑절이나 주신지라

sentences.original_text: And the Lord restored the fortunes of Job
when he had prayed for his friends
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 자기 친구들을 위해 기도하였을 때

sentences.original_text: And the Lord gave Job twice as much
